data.prayer: Father, you have chosen the weak things of this world to confound the strong. Make the poor and outcast in the state of Tarrafal a testimony of your strength.
data.verse: God chose the foolish things of the world that he might put to shame those who are wise. God chose the weak things of the world, that he might put to shame the things that are strong;

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Tarrafal, Cape Verde
data.section_summary: What needs would people have here?

data.prayer: Father, help your children in Tarrafal, Cape Verde find someone like the Samaritan Woman today. Someone who will open an entire town to your message of salvation.
data.verse: So the woman left her water jar and went away into town and said to the people, 29 “Come, see a man who told me all that I ever did. Can this be the Christ?” They went out of the town and were coming to him.

data.prayer: Spirit, build the strength and maturity of the local leaders in Tarrafal, Cape Verde. Show them that faithfulness is better than knowledge. Show them that the Spirit, the Word, and prayer is enough in order to grow and lead.
Father, encourage the 443 believers to have boldness before you, since they have a great high priest who has passed through the heavens, Jesus the Son of God.
data.verse: Since then we have a great high priest who has passed through the heavens, Jesus, the Son of God, let us hold fast our confession.

data.focus_label: Pray for the city of Tarrafal
data.prayer: Pray that God raises up new churches in the city of Tarrafal, Tarrafal, Cape Verde.
Father, for all those you call to look after your flock from the 443 believers in Tarrafal, please, make them passionate about hearing your Word.
data.verse: Therefore, you shepherds, hear the word of the LORD.

data.prayer: Spirit, help the church in the state of Tarrafal do things that will multiply their numbers, not just add to them.
data.verse: But thanks be to God, who always leads us triumphantly as captives in Christ and through us spreads everywhere the fragrance of the knowledge of Him.

data.prayer: Lord we pray you unite the 443 believers to pray at all times in the Spirit, with all prayer and supplication, for spiritual breakthrough in Tarrafal.
data.verse: in every situation, by prayer and petition, with thanksgiving, present your requests to God.
